{{disambig-two|the journal on [[Tolkien studies]]|the land within the legendarium|[[Hither Shore]]}}
'''''Hither Shore: Interdisciplinary Journal on Modern Fantasy Literature''''' is the title of a bilingual (German and English) peer-reviewed annual published by the [[Deutsche Tolkien Gesellschaft]] (the German [[Tolkien Societies|Tolkien Society]]). Overviews of the first five issues can be found in ''[[Tolkien Studies (journal)|Tolkien Studies]]'': [[Tolkien Studies: Volume 5|Volume 5]] (2008) pp. 221–9, and [[Tolkien Studies: Volume 8|Volume 8]] (2011) pp. 114–20.

==Issues==
*[[2004]]: [[Hither Shore 1|''Hither Shore'' 1: Tolkien und seine Deutungen]]
*[[2005]]: [[Hither Shore 2|''Hither Shore'' 2: Tolkiens Weltbild(er)]]
*[[2006]]: [[Hither Shore 3|''Hither Shore'' 3: History of Middle-earth]]
*[[2007]]: [[Hither Shore 4|''Hither Shore'' 4: Tolkiens kleinere Werke]]
*[[2008]]: [[Hither Shore 5|''Hither Shore'' 5: Der Hobbit]]
*[[2009]]: [[Hither Shore 6|''Hither Shore'' 6: Gewalt, Konflikt und Krieg bei Tolkien]]
*[[2010]]: [[Hither Shore 7|''Hither Shore'' 7: Tolkien und Romantik]]
*[[2011]]: [[Hither Shore 8|''Hither Shore'' 8: Tolkien und das Mittelalter]]
*[[2012]]: [[Hither Shore 9|''Hither Shore'' 9: Tolkien's Influence on Fantasy]]
*[[2013]]: [[Hither Shore 10|''Hither Shore'' 10: Tolkien-Adaptionen]]
*[[2014]]: [[Hither Shore 11|''Hither Shore'' 11: Natur und Landschaft in Tolkiens Werk]]
*[[2015]]: [[Hither Shore 12|''Hither Shore'' 12: Tolkien's "On Fairy-stories"]]
*[[2016]]: [[Hither Shore 13|''Hither Shore'' 13: Tolkiens Philosophie der Sprache]]
*[[2017]]: [[Hither Shore 14|''Hither Shore'' 14: Literary Worldbuilding]]
*[[2018]]: [[Hither Shore 15|''Hither Shore'' 15: 80 Years of Tolkien Criticism and Reception]] (yet to be released)
*[[2019]]: [[Hither Shore 16|''Hither Shore'' 16: Macht und Autorität in Tolkiens Werk]]
*[[2020]]: [[Hither Shore 17|''Hither Shore'' 17: Brücken und Grenzen]]
*[[2021]]: [[Hither Shore 18|''Hither Shore'' 18: Tolkien und Politik]]
*[[2022]]: [[Hither Shore 19|''Hither Shore'' 19: Raum und Zeit in Tolkiens Werk]]
*[[2023]]: [[Hither Shore 20|''Hither Shore'' 20: Mit anderen Augen: Die Visualisierung von Tolkiens Werk]]
*[[2024]]: [[Hither Shore 21|''Hither Shore'' 21: Tolkien und seine Herausgeber:innen]]
